short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: SAP Sales Cloud, server-side integration brings the power of SAP Sales Cloud to your Google mailbox.
short.cs: SAP Sales Cloud, integrace na straně serveru, přináší možnosti SAP Sales Cloud do vaší doručené pošty na Googlu.
short.de: SAP Sales Cloud, serverseitige Integration, verbindet SAP Sales Cloud und Ihr Google-Postfach.
short.es: SAP Sales Cloud, integración por parte del servidor brinda la eficiencia de SAP Sales Cloud a su casilla de Google.
short.fr: SAP Sales Cloud, intégr. côté serveur donne la puissance de SAP Sls Cld. à votre boîte aux lettres Google.
short.it: SAP Sales Cloud, integrazione lato server integra la tecnologia di SAP Sales Cloud nella casella di posta Google.
short.ja: SAP Sales Cloud サーバサイド統合により、SAP Sales Cloud の機能を Google 電子メールボックスで使用できるようになります。
short.nl: SAP Sales Cloud, server-side integratie bundelt de krachten van SAP Sales Cloud en integreert deze in uw Google-mailbox.
short.pl: SAP Sales Cloud, integracja po stronie serwera, pozwoli Ci korzystać z możliwości rozwiązania SAP Sales Cloud bezpośrednio w Twojej…
short.pt_BR: O SAP Sales Cloud, integração no servidor, leva o poder do SAP Sales Cloud à caixa de correio do Google.
short.ru: SAP Sales Cloud, серверная интеграция, - мощные возможности SAP Sales Cloud для почтового ящика Google.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U:
SAP Sales Cloud is a one-stop shop for Gmail to SAP Sales Cloud integration that actually works. The highly configurable Sync Engine allows you to log sales data in full auto mode, while the Inbox sidebar will bring entire CRM data right to your fingertips.
 
Improve sales efficiency by:
 
- Bi-directionally syncing emails, calendars, contacts, tasks, and attachments between Outlook and SAP Sales Cloud
- Works in full auto, 2 or 1-way, or rule-based modes
- Highly configurable
 
Boost sales productivity by:
 
- Working with all the contact-related CRM data directly from the Outlook / Gmail sidebar
- Create SAP Sales Cloud leads, opportunities, tasks, and custom objects without leaving the inbox
- Highly customizable drag-and-drop layout
 
Enterprise oriented:
 
- Secure and stable
- Great support and full onboarding assistance
- Supports desktop, cloud, mobile, and all Exchange versions
- Huge integration portfolio
- 10 years on the market
long.cs,it,nl,pl,pt_BR,ru:
With the SAP Cloud for Customer extension for Gmail, you can leverage tools you use every day to be more productive right within Gmail. This extension connects to the SAP Cloud for Customer solution and provides a quick view of all relevant information when e-mailing prospects and customers and allows you to link e-mail conversations, view contact information, and create new opportunities, tasks, and visits, all directly from Gmail.

Key features of SAP Cloud for Customer extension for Gmail
•  Link e-mails to an existing account or opportunity and keep all customer conversations synced
•  See all related leads, opportunities, visits, activities, and tasks based on sender’s e-mail
•  Create new contacts
•  Generate new opportunities 
•  Create a new task or visit as a follow-up to an e-mail action item

Note: To use SAP Cloud for Customer extension for Gmail with your business data, you must be a user of you must be a user of SAP Cloud for Customer.
long.de,es,fr,ja:

This extension connects to the SAP Hybris Cloud for Customer solution and provides a quick view of all relevant information when e-mailing prospects and customers and allows you to link e-mail conversations, view contact information, and create new opportunities, tasks, and visits, all directly from Gmail.

Key features of SAP Hybris Cloud for Customer for Gmail
•  Link e-mails to an existing account or opportunity and keep all customer conversations synced
•  See all related leads, opportunities, visits, activities, and tasks based on sender’s e-mail
•  Create new contacts
•  Generate new opportunities 
•  Create a new task or visit as a follow-up to an e-mail action item

Note: To use SAP Hybris Cloud for Customer for Gmail with your business data, you must be a user of you must be a user of SAP Hybris Cloud for Customer.
